fact_check_explanation_title: Was Dawn Butler right about Boris Johnson ‘lying’ to Parliament?
fact_check_explanation_summary: Dawn Butler was removed from the Commons for claiming that the Prime Minister lied.

fact_check_explanation_title: Boris Johnson hasn’t had three Covid-19 vaccines
fact_check_explanation_summary: One of the pictures circulated on social media shows the PM receiving a flu vaccination.

fact_check_explanation_title: Boris Johnson was wrong to say that “everybody” is entitled to extra self-isolation support
fact_check_explanation_summary: People are not entitled to the equivalent of the living wage while they self-isolate, and a £500 support payment is only for those on benefits or in hardship.

fact_check_explanation_title: Double vaccinated people do not make up 60% of Covid-19 hospitalisations
fact_check_explanation_summary: Sir Patrick Vallance, the government’s chief scientific adviser, has corrected comments he made at a press conference.

fact_check_explanation_title: Richard Tice makes misleading claims about Covid-19 vaccines and fertility
fact_check_explanation_summary: The Reform UK leader’s claim is based on Yellow Card and VAERS data, which does not show proven adverse reactions to the vaccines.

fact_check_explanation_title: Young people do face a small risk from Covid
fact_check_explanation_summary: Death and severe disease are very unlikely, but there is not no risk of them “at all”.

fact_check_explanation_title: Vaccines have not caused daily cases to increase
fact_check_explanation_summary: There are more daily cases than July of last year despite high vaccine coverage.

fact_check_explanation_title: Children are very unlikely to die of Covid-19
fact_check_explanation_summary: The risk of death is one in tens of thousands even if they catch it, and the risk of serious illness is very low too.

fact_check_explanation_title: TfL is part of self-isolation pilot scheme
fact_check_explanation_summary: TfL initially suggested it wasn’t part of the scheme. Boris Johnson and Rishi Sunak said they wouldn't be self-isolating due to being part of the pilot themselves, before the decision …

fact_check_explanation_title: Average Covid-19 victim dies years before they otherwise would
fact_check_explanation_summary: In an allegedly leaked WhatsApp message, Boris Johnson appeared to claim that the average age of Covid-19 deaths is higher than the average life expectancy.

fact_check_explanation_title: Free paper repeats falsehoods on deaths following vaccination
fact_check_explanation_summary: There’s no proof 1,400 people have died because of the vaccination.

fact_check_explanation_title: Lord Sumption made several errors about Covid on Today
fact_check_explanation_summary: More than 100,000 deaths have been caused by Covid, and it has killed thousands of people who had no pre-existing condition.
